CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Points_Exception__c , "N/A") , ( IF( ISPICKVAL( Points_Type__c , "Gold") , 0.001 * Won_Value__c , IF(ISPICKVAL( Points_Type__c , "Diamond"), 0.002 * Won_Value__c, IF( ISPICKVAL( Points_Type__c , "Color Stone") , 0.003 * Won_Value__c , 0) ) ) ), (IF( ISPICKVAL( Points_Exception__c , "Discount") , ( IF( ISPICKVAL( Points_Type__c , "Gold") , 0.001 * Won_Value__c , IF(ISPICKVAL( Points_Type__c , "Diamond"), 0.002 * Won_Value__c, IF( ISPICKVAL( Points_Type__c , "Color Stone") , 0.003 * Won_Value__c , 0) ) ) ),0)))
CustomField.label: Points Won
